original_title: Living Colour: On Stage at World Cafe Live
overview: On Stage Live At World Cafe Live (2007) is a live concert DVD from the funk metal band Living Colour performing live at the University of Pennsylvania as part of the World Cafe on Philadelphia's WXPN radio station.  The performance was filmed on December 15, 2005.  01.  Desperate People  02. Middle Man  03. In Your Name  04. Open Letter (To a Landlord)  05. Wall  06. Glamour Boys  07. Love Rears Its Ugly Head  08. Bless Those  09. Ignorance Is Bliss  10. Ausl√§nder  11. Cult of Personality
title: Living Colour: On Stage at World Cafe Live
